# Homepage

<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OZI-Project/brand/main/images/ozi_social_preview.png" alt="Logo" width="680px">

OZI is under active development and expected to be in Beta release status by Aug 2024.

<br>

![Button](https://img.shields.io/pypi/status/ozi?style=flat-square&logo=pypi) ![PyPI - Python Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/OZI?style=flat-square&logo=python) ![Static Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/SLSA-level_3-grey?style=flat-square&logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%%2BCjwvc3ZnPgo%3D&color=dark-green)
